unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent. We at Infosys, Bangalore, plan visits to IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad starting 25/12/2023. Ms. Sharma will lead the recruitment. We aim to onboard exceptional graduates by 15/01/2024. A presentation is scheduled for 10:00 hrs. We offer competitive packages starting Rs. 7 LPA. Looking forward to meeting bright minds! This year's batch is especially promising, observed on 01/11/2023.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent. We at I N F O S Y S, Bangalore, plan visits to I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad starting twenty fifth december two thousand and twenty three. Missus Sharma will lead the recruitment. We aim to onboard exceptional graduates by fifteenth january two thousand and twenty four. A presentation is scheduled for ten zero zero hours. We offer competitive packages starting rupees seven L P A. Looking forward to meeting bright minds! This year's batch is especially promising, observed on first november two thousand and twenty three.
